name: NR Configurable Maximum UE Throughput
summary: This feature allows the operator to limit the maximum throughput for a UE in the

parameters.name: UeBbProfileUeCfg.ueGroupList
parameters.description: The UeBbProfileUeCfg.ueGroupList and                                     UeBbProfileUeCfg.prefUeGroupList attributes                                 are used to determine the group to which the UE belongs.

parameters.name: UeBbProfileUeCfg.prefUeGroupList
parameters.description: The UeBbProfileUeCfg.ueGroupList and                                     UeBbProfileUeCfg.prefUeGroupList attributes                                 are used to determine the group to which the UE belongs.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012611 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012611 MO instance.
